com.contentful.java.cda

Class CDAClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.contentful.java.cda.CDAClient

  • public class CDAClient
extends Object
    Client to be used when requesting information from the Delivery API. Every client is associated with exactly one Space, but there is no limit to the concurrent number of clients existing at any one time. Avoid creating multiple clients for the same Space. Use the CDAClient.Builder class to create a client.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CDAClient.Builder
      Client builder.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpace

        public CDASpace getSpace()
        Returns the CDASpace object associated with this client. Note that a Space is attached to a client only after it's first request was successfully executed.
        Returns:
        CDASpace instance, null if it was not yet retrieved

      • getHttpScheme

        public String getHttpScheme()
        Gets the HTTP scheme configured for this client.
        Returns:
        the HTTP scheme configured for this client. This can be either HTTP or HTTPS
